page.title: 03HOW DENBIGH HAS CHANGED.
page.content: We interviewed{Miss Purchase,}who was about{95}yrs old.She has lived in Denbigh for about{90}yrs.She said, "There's violence on television which shouldn't be shown to children."She thought Denbigh was no tidier and that young people are kinder to their elders.She also said the Swimming Pool and the High School were not here when she came.She also thought that shops have changed considerably with{Timothy {Whites,Grocery Shops}and{Fish Shops} gone,but the{bus stops}are much the same.She also said that schools don't go to the seaside for trips anymore.She remarked that schools are much nicer and children are less independent now.She went to school when she was{12},and up to then she only knew{2}other girls.
